title: Topic 004 Question 008
body: A company has an Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) tenant. The company deploys Azure AD Connect to synchronize objects from their Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS) domain.
You observe that AD DS objects are not synchronizing to Azure AD.
You need to verify that the staging mode is enabled.
options: Review the history for the Azure AD Connect sync scheduled task.
Review the triggers for the Azure AD Connect sync scheduled task.
